title: Alt★Hero Episode 2
author: VD
content_html: Alt★Hero Episode 2: Job Offer is now live on Webtoons. This series runs every Friday. The comics offensive continues even as the establishment continues to crumble. We’re already being contacted by top talent who had previously worked with Marvel and/or DC. This is further evidence that having a relatively small, but disciplined and high-morale legion is more important than numbers, resources, established brand, or infrastructure.
content_text:
Alt★Hero Episode 2: Job Offer
is now live on Webtoons. This series runs every Friday. The comics offensive continues even as the establishment continues to crumble. We’re already being contacted by top talent who had previously worked with Marvel and/or DC. This is further evidence that having a relatively small, but disciplined and high-morale legion is more important than numbers, resources, established brand, or infrastructure.
